title: 69Another woman stabbed at Chicago train station just months after Irina died in an eerily similar a
content:
69 Another woman stabbed at Chicago train station just months after Irina died in an eerily similar attack. The unidentified suspect approached a woman sitting on a bench at the UIC-Halstead CTA Blue Line stop in the city's Near West Side at 11.14pm on Saturday, took out a knife, and stabbed her chest. (www.dailymail.co.uk) POSSIBLY  WHITE posted 6 hours ago by BlackCrimesMatter 11 comments award share report block Chicago train station horror as woman stabbed in chest Chicago police are searching for a man they say stabbed a woman at a train station over the weekend, months after a Ukrainian refugee was killed in an eerily similar attack. www.dailymail.co.uk
